channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Epstein emails released by Democrats say Trump ‘knew about the girls’ and spent time with a victim
item.description: Disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein wrote in a 2011 email Donald Trump had “spent hours” at Epstein’s house with a victim of sex trafficking and said in a separate message years later Trump “knew about the girls.”

item.title: House returns for vote to end the government shutdown after nearly 2 months away
What to know about the status of SNAP food aid as a vote nears to end the shutdown
